Effect Your connections with leaders within the Pathfinder Society help you find opportunities, both new missions and support for your other endeavors. Check the box that precedes this boon when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Earn Income] during Downtime to attempt a task of level _. If you critically fail the check, you still earn the result of a failure for that task.
